code: export var CoinList=function CoinList(currency){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=".concat(currency,"&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=100&page=1&sparkline=false");};export var SingleCoin=function SingleCoin(id){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/".concat(id);};export var HistoricalChart=function HistoricalChart(id){var days=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:365;var currency=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/".concat(id,"/market_chart?vs_currency=").concat(currency,"&days=").concat(days);};export var TrendingCoins=function TrendingCoins(currency){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=".concat(currency,"&order=gecko_desc&per_page=10&page=1&sparkline=false&price_change_percentage=24h");};
